However, our cultural framework also places a strong emphasis on personal responsibility and adherence to laws, which are seen as reflections of divine order. Yet, this must be balanced with the need for fairness and equality under the law, ensuring that any pathways to legal status are equitable and do not undermine the principles of justice and personal responsibility.
